argument.description: An expression that represents which unit of datetime is to be extracted from the date-expression.

An expression that represents which unit of datetime is to be extracted from the date-expression.

description: The DATE_PART function returns a portion of a datetime based on its arguments. It extracts the subfield that is specified from the date, time, timestamp, and duration values.
